title: G-test Calculator â€“ Likelihood-Ratio Test for Counts

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( G = 2 \sum_i O_i \ln\left(\dfrac{O_i}{E_i}\right) \) \( O_i \) = observed count in cell i \( E_i \) = expected count in cell i under the null hypothesis
